author: Ben Kesling, Nancy A. Youssef
title: Sailors Braced for the Worst...
description: Sailors Braced for the Worst... (First column, 3rd story, link ) Related stories: Trump Backs Dismissal of USS Roosevelt Captain... Whistleblower raised alarm about virus outbreak on ship... Theodore Roosevelt captain followed in footsteps of ship's namesake …
content: The visit to Vietnam in early March was intended as a historic milestone and a symbol of far-reaching U.S. aims in the Pacific, marking 25 years of diplomatic relations with a rare port call by an American aircraft carrier that had been months in the planning… [+276 chars]
